item.description:
NHC Softball Team will be holding a practice/ pickup game on Saturday, May, 26th, 2007, at 10am - 12pm at East Shore Park in New Haven, CT. approx 4 miles from downtown New Haven. Field time is very hard to get on weekends in the summer. And everyone can use some practice!

NHC Softball Team members are required to attend if you are in town and not doing something more important than softball.

Other Softball team members are joining our practice as well.

If you are interested in just playing softball or getting some exercise, you are welcome as well.

Post practice BBQ at location to be named after practice.

EAST SHORE PARK: I-95 North to Exit 50 (Woodward Ave), turn right onto Woodward and go Â¾ mile to entrance of East Shore Park on right. Field is all the way back of park. (The other field is parallel to Woodward Ave, Parking on right just before field.

I-95 South to Exit 51, go 3 lights and turn left onto Woodward Ave, going over I-95. Follow above directions.
item.name: SOFTBALL PRACTICE/PICKUP GAME
